meanings.definition: The act of riding a quad bike.
meanings.sent1: Quadding can be a thrilling outdoor adventure for many people.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy quadding with my friends on the weekends.
meanings.sent3: The family had a fun day quadding around the countryside.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like quadding through uncharted territory.
meanings.sent5: The sound of quadding echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: The activity of participating in a group of four people or things.
meanings.sent1: Our quadding team won the competition last year.
meanings.sent2: Quadding in a group can be a great way to bond with others.
meanings.sent3: The quadding of ducks in the pond was a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a well-oiled quadding machine.
meanings.sent5: The quadding of stars in the sky was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The process of dividing something into four parts.
meanings.sent1: The quadding of the cake made it easy to share with everyone.
meanings.sent2: Quadding the land into sections helped with organization.
meanings.sent3: The quadding of the pizza caused a debate over toppings.
meanings.sent4: The quadding of time into segments made the project more manageable.
meanings.sent5: The quadding of the document simplified the analysis process.
